name: Idle Sport Park Tycoon
description:
Will you ever be ready to be rich?

Become the richest Sport entrepreneur!

Build your own sport business, earn money, and become the best Sport Park in the world!

Start with a one sport and turn it into a major sport park business. Build a golf field , tennis courts, offer high-quality ice creams donuts and provide your visitors with ability to drive Kayak like never before and shoot hoops on amazing Basket Ball field.

Research new features to improve the how fast your "Sport enthusiast" play and how many can play sport in same time

Become the best sport park manager. Build a huge parking lot where they can safely leave their vehicles while they shop.


If you like idle and tapping games, you will enjoy this sport park management game. Idle Sport Park Tycoon is an easy-to-play game where you run your own business with different sports Make important management decisions to build your empire and transform your small sport park into one of the greatest in the world!

Features:
- Casual and easy gameplay
- Different challenges to complete
- Amazing animations and 3D graphics with unmatched game play of visitors
- Unique sports to play
- Make important managing decisions to expand your business
